name: Science Fiction
description: Fiction dealing with futuristic concepts, advanced technology, space exploration, time travel, and extraterrestrial life.

name: Fantasy
description: Fiction involving magical and supernatural elements, often set in imaginary worlds with mythical creatures.

name: Mystery
description: Fiction involving the solving of a crime or puzzle, often featuring detectives or amateur sleuths.

name: Romance
description: Fiction focusing on romantic relationships and emotional connections between characters.

name: Thriller
description: Fiction designed to create suspense, excitement, and tension, often involving danger and high stakes.

name: Horror
description: Fiction intended to frighten, scare, or startle readers through supernatural or psychological elements.

name: Historical Fiction
description: Fiction set in the past, often featuring real historical events, figures, or periods.

name: Adventure
description: Fiction involving exciting journeys, quests, or expeditions with action and discovery.

name: Comedy
description: Fiction intended to be humorous, often featuring witty dialogue and amusing situations.

name: Drama
description: Fiction focusing on character development and emotional depth, often dealing with serious themes.

name: Action
description: Fiction featuring fast-paced sequences, physical confrontations, and high-energy scenes.

name: Biography
description: Non-fiction accounts of real people's lives, written by others or as autobiographies.

name: Self-Help
description: Non-fiction books intended to help readers improve themselves or solve personal problems.

name: Philosophy
description: Non-fiction exploring fundamental questions about existence, knowledge, values, and reality.

name: Poetry
description: Literary works that use aesthetic and rhythmic qualities of language to evoke meanings.
